members.title: Member Management
members.description: After adding members, they can share your membership benefits. Suitable for families, enterprises and multi-user scenarios.
members.noMembersDesc: You haven't added any members yet
members.emailHelp: Member will log in and use your membership benefits with this email
members.emailAlreadyInUse: This email is already in use
members.addMemberFailedRetry: Failed to add member, please retry
members.removeMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member? After removal, the member will no longer be able to use your membership benefits.

members.getMembersFailedRetry: Failed to retrieve member list, please retry

delegate.title: Payer Management
delegate.description: Manage users who pay for your account
delegate.noDelegate: You currently have no payer and are using your own membership benefits
delegate.info: A user is currently paying for your account. You can use this user's membership benefits.
delegate.rejectWarning: After rejecting payment delegation, you will lose the membership benefits provided by this user and will need to pay yourself or find another payer.

rejectSuccess.title: Rejection successful
rejectSuccess.description: You have successfully rejected the payment delegation

migrated.title: Task system migrated
migrated.description: Asynchronous tasks are now managed through the Asynqmon monitoring dashboard. You can view task queues, execution status and history in Asynqmon. Email delivery logs can be viewed on the EDM delivery logs page.
